name: End Days: Prototype Ver.
description:
End Days is a Digital Prototype I created as part of my Game Design Year 1 Coursework. This is a small demo which showcases gameplay and mechanics which I had planned in a Game Design Document. The point of this project was to start from the Ideation Process, Create a GDD, Make a Paper Prototype and then create that game idea in a Game Engine. 

End Days is a Tower Defence game set in the distant future where Nature as turnt on Humanity and they are at war with eachother. This Prototype shows a slice of what the final game could look like. 

DEVELOPMENT

Development started with the Ideation Process where I would try different ways to generate ideas andthen turn the idea I liked the most into a Game Design Document. Once I had done that I then created a Paper Prototype to test my idea and to see if it worked. After this I began development on the Digital Version, you can check out my Devlogs below to see the development of the Prototype.
